name: CHAOS - In the Darkness
description: Chaos is an heroic fantasy RPG that immerses you in an war for survival of Silmeria and Gods themselves. Alone or with teamates, you will fight dread creatures to the depths of three dungeons, and then defeat the Avatar, a monstrous being, born from the power of Chaos.

reviews.review_text: POS does not even run. There is an old post stating you can get it running if you run old versions of Java which arent easy to find. For me i could not get this game running even after trying just about every version of Java JRE there was (version 7 +8). It even tells you which Java software to run then redirects you to a newer version which doesn't work.   Bottom line, Its broke and they arent around to fix it.
